languages.text: Насильственное отключение от устройства гемункула, связанного с разумом Идиры, не могло не иметь последствий.
Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences.
languages.original_text: Насильственное отключение от устройства гемункула, связанного с разумом Идиры, не могло не иметь последствий.

traits.locale_text: Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences.
Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences.
Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences.
Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences.
Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences.
Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences.

languages.text: イディラは、自分の心とつながっているハモンキュラスの装置から強制的に引き離された。
languages.original_text: Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences.

traits.locale_text: イディラは、自分の心とつながっているハモンキュラスの装置から強制的に引き離された。

languages.text: 血伶人的装置原本与伊迪拉紧密相连，如今已经被强行摘了下来，这肯定会导致不良后果。
languages.original_text: Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences.

traits.locale_text: 血伶人的装置原本与伊迪拉紧密相连，如今已经被强行摘了下来，这肯定会导致不良后果。

languages.text: La separación forzosa de Idira del dispositivo del Hemónculo que estaba conectado a su mente tiene consecuencias, como cabía esperar.
languages.original_text: Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences.

traits.locale_text: La separación forzosa de Idira del dispositivo del Hemónculo que estaba conectado a su mente tiene consecuencias, como cabía esperar.

languages.text: Es war zu erwarten, dass es Folgen haben würde, wenn Idira zwangweise von dem Gerät des Haemonculus getrennt wird, das mit ihrem Verstand verbunden war.
languages.original_text: Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences.

traits.locale_text: Es war zu erwarten, dass es Folgen haben würde, wenn Idira zwangweise von dem Gerät des Haemonculus getrennt wird, das mit ihrem Verstand verbunden war.

languages.text: Forcer la déconnexion entre Idira et l'appareil de l'hémoncule allait forcément avoir des conséquences.
languages.original_text: Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences.

traits.locale_text: Forcer la déconnexion entre Idira et l'appareil de l'hémoncule allait forcément avoir des conséquences.

languages.text: İdira'nın, zihnine bağlı olan Haimonkulus'un cihazından zorla ayrılmasının tabii ki sonuçları olacaktı.
languages.original_text: Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences.

traits.locale_text: İdira'nın, zihnine bağlı olan Haimonkulus'un cihazından zorla ayrılmasının tabii ki sonuçları olacaktı.
